projects.title: Ajar PropTech Platform Overhaul and Enhancement
projects.description: At Ajar, a pioneering PropTech firm in the Middle East, I took the helm of front-end development to institute major platform overhauls and innovatively integrate new features. I completely reconstructed the landing pages using Angular and Bootstrap, which directly translated into a 30% uptick in user engagement. I optimized the login and sign-up processes, added robust features like expense management and report downloading, and revamped the leases management system. Furthermore, I championed the migration from Firebase APIs to REST APIs, improving backend data handling and overall platform responsiveness. As a testament to my adaptability, I seamlessly transitioned from React to Angular within a tight two-month window. In collaboration with marketing initiatives, I drove the implementation of Facebook and Snapchat tracking pixels, culminating in a notable 20% increase in high-value clients. By incorporating automated test cases using Playwright with GitHub workflows, I advanced the deployment process, ensuring faster release cycles, a heightened code quality, and a 35% reduction in bug resolution time. Throughout, I maintained the brand's graphic consistency and high-quality standards, further elevating the platform's user experience.

projects.title: Tenant Dashboard Solution
projects.description: Designed a comprehensive tenant dashboard prototype to assist newcomers in the MENA property market. The dashboard provides an overview of rent payments, maintenance requests, and essential property documentation. Tenants also gain insights into regional news and can efficiently manage work order requests, receipt histories, and critical document storage. Integrated Auth0 for secure login and Ant Design for a scalable UI. The responsive design ensures a seamless experience across devices.

projects.title: GitHub Trending Page Replica
projects.description: Developed a replica of the GitHub trending page to understand the intricacies of popular repositories' display. Leveraged React for UI components, Tailwind for styling, and efficiently fetched data with react query and axios.

projects.title: Jungle E-commerce Webshop
projects.description: Built an interactive e-commerce SPA using Commerce.js and React. Seamlessly integrated Stripe for payments and used React Hook Forms for efficient customer data management. Styled using Material UI.

projects.title: Intuitive Expense Tracker
projects.description: Crafted a user-friendly expense tracker in React. Users can seamlessly log expenses, filter by year, and visualize data through an intuitive bar chart. Achieved efficient initial rendering with CRA.

projects.title: Gourmet Recipe Viewer
projects.description: Designed an elegant recipe viewer with Gatsby and Contentful. Users can effortlessly explore recipes through tags or a dedicated list. Each recipe page offers detailed instructions, serving sizes, and necessary cooking appliances.

projects.title: Rick and Morty Character Showcase
projects.description: Crafted a fun SPA with Vite, giving fans of the show a chance to discover random characters and their backstories. Developed using Typescript and React and brought to life with Tailwind styling.

projects.title: Dynamic Food Ordering Interface
projects.description: Developed a dynamic food ordering SPA. Showcased dishes from an API based on inventory and discounts. Enhanced user experience by preserving cart data using local storage. Styled with React and Tailwind.

projects.title: Facial Recognition Interface
projects.description: Incorporated Clarifai API into a SPA to detect faces in uploaded images. Users can register and track their photo scan count. Backed by a robust server infrastructure using Node.js, Express.js, and PostgressSQL.

projects.title: Elegant Image Gallery
projects.description: Merged React's efficiency with Tailwind's styling to build a stunning image gallery. Users can search and view images sourced from the Pixabay API.

projects.title: RoboFriends: A Robot Showcase
projects.description: Constructed a visual treat for users by showcasing robot images from the RoboHash API. Utilized React for component design and styled with Tachyons.

projects.title: iOS-inspired Alarm Interface
projects.description: Emulated iOS alarm screen flows in a web environment. Persisted user-set alarm values through local storage and integrated ion.RangeSlider for time manipulation.

projects.title: Travel Enthusiast Landing Page
projects.description: Designed a fully responsive travel-themed landing page. Developed from scratch, incorporating modern web technologies like Node.js, ES6 JS, webpack, and gulp for an optimized user experience.
